record.title: MAKING TECHNICAL CORRECTIONS IN THE ENROLLMENT OF H.R. 493
record.narrative:
MAKING TECHNICAL CORRECTIONS IN THE ENROLLMENT OF H.R. 493 -- (Senate - May 01, 2008)

[Page: S3727]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 340, received from the House and at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 340) to make technical corrections in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 493.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 340) was agreed to.
